metadata.description: Quick Controls useful when editing your pattern

sections.text: The Timeline has a Toolbar which contains quick actions.

sections.title: What is the Timeline Toolbar?
sections.text: The Timeline Toolbar sits above the Toolbar and offers quick and often used actions when designing your Haptics

sections.title: Play/Stop Button
sections.text: If you have Audio in your Project, using the Play button will play the first audio file, it's useful for checking if your events are firing in the right place

sections.title: Zoom Slider
sections.text: The zoom slider allows you to quickly zoom in and out of the canvas

sections.title: Filter Events
sections.text: If you want to display only a certain type of events, use this dropdown to change the visibility of events, or view them all

sections.title: Sort Events
sections.text: Sort the events by start time in the timeline, you can sort Ascending or Descending
